features: Women's Specific Fit: Engineered to fit a woman's frame
3D Vent Mesh: Multi-directional air flow and cushioning to maximize comfort and breathability
Secure Zippered Pocket: Keep your phone and other essentials safely stowed
Dual Adjustable Sternum Straps: Offer a range of adjustments for a custom fit and increased stability
Integrated Tool Organization: Keeps all your tools and small essentials in one location
Reflectivity and Light Loop: For added visibility and safety
Stretch Overflow Pocket: Quickly stash or shed a layer or rain shell
Sits Above Jersey Pockets: Allows access to additional on body storage
Elastic Pump Loop: Keeps your pump secure and easy to locate
